Html:
I tried the below code even i didn't able to remove the zooming on horizontal and vertical axis.

AxisNavigation HVaxis = new AxisNavigation();
                plotter.Children.Remove(HVaxis);

 

Can u please   revise my code?       

 

 

Thanks & Regards

Srujana

Srujana,

You need to remove the existing AxisNavigation object from the plotter.  Your code is attempting to create a new one!

plotter.Children.Remove(plotter.HorizontalAxisNavigation);
plotter.Children.Remove(plotter.VerticalAxisNavigation);
plotter.Children.Remove(plotter.KeyboardNavigation);

Grant.
